alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 1:12AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Greene, Craighead, Poinsett, northwestern Mississippi, northwestern Crittenden, northern Cross and southern Dunklin Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 112 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jonesboro to near Harrisburg to near Hickory Ridge. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Paragould, Trumann, Manila, Marked Tree, Harrisburg, Lake City, Leachville, Lepanto, Bay, Senath, Brookland, Monette, Caraway, Tyronza, Cardwell, Hornersville, Cherry Valley, Arbyrd and Dyess. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for eastern Arkansas.
